data.title: WPF Property Grid
data.meta_description: Mindscape WPF Elements Property Grid Control
data.text:
Mindscape shipped the very first property grid for WPF and has been improving and innovating the Property Grid control ever since. Experience the best WPF Property Grid available as part of WPF Elements.

Key features:

Works with single or multiple selected objects

Add remove items from collections

Search, filtering and categorisation support

Many built in editors, easily define your own editors

5 themes included out of the box

Sizzling screenshots

Click the thumbnail images below to see full sized images. These are just a taste of what is possible thanks to the power and flexibility of Windows Presentation Foundation.

New with the WPF Property Grid, three sample templates are included for you to use in your projects and also provide guidence on how to completely redesign how your property grid looks to kick start your development!
